meanings.definition: A large quantity or number of something.
meanings.sent1: There were tabuns of books in the library.
meanings.sent2: She had tabuns of toys in her room.
meanings.sent3: I have tabuns of socks, but I can never find a matching pair!
meanings.sent4: The field was covered with tabuns of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The bakery displayed tabuns of delicious pastries in the window.

meanings.definition: Used to express disbelief or surprise.
meanings.sent1: Tabuns! I can't believe you ate the whole cake.
meanings.sent2: Tabuns, that magic trick was amazing!
meanings.sent3: Tabuns, did you see that dog riding a skateboard?
meanings.sent4: Tabuns! The sunset looks like a painting.
meanings.sent5: Tabuns, I never knew you could play the piano so well!

meanings.sent1: The soldiers were equipped with tabuns for protection.
meanings.sent2: The lab tested the effects of tabuns on different organisms.
meanings.sent3: The spy used tabuns to create a diversion during the mission.
meanings.sent4: The dangerous terrorist group had access to tabuns.
meanings.sent5: The scientists studied the effects of tabuns on the nervous system.
